de.kaleidox.botstats.model

Class StatsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kaleidox.botstats.model.StatsClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CatnipStatsClient, Discord4JStatsClient, JavacordStatsClient, JDAStatsClient

    public abstract class StatsClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Base class for handling bot list stats.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatsClient

        protected StatsClient(BotListSettings settings,
                      JsonFactory jsonFactory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        settings - A settings object with all tokens that are to be used.
        jsonFactory - A JsonFactory instance used for creating json strings.

    • Method Detail

      • updateTokensFromSettings

        public void updateTokensFromSettings()
        Call this method to re-initialize all tokens defined in the attached BotListSettings object. Does nothing if no tokens are defined in the settings object.

      • updateTokensFromFile

        public void updateTokensFromFile()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Call this method to re-initialize all tokens from the defined token file. Does nothing if no token file was specified.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Any exception that occurred during read or write actions.

      • updateAllStats

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> updateAllStats()
        Updates the server count on all available bot lists.

        This method is automatically invoked by GuildMemberJoin and GuildMemberLeave events in the default supported libraries.

        Returns:
        A future that completes when all stats have been updated.

      • executeRequest

        protected abstract java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> executeRequest(java.net.URL url,
                                                                                           Method method,
                                                                                           java.lang.String authorization,
                                                                                           java.lang.String body)
        Used to place a web request using the librarie's default REST dependency for no extra dependencies.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to place the request to.
        method - The HTTP method for the request.
        authorization - The authorization token for the web page.
        body - The request body. application/json supported only.
        Returns:
        A future that completes with the response of the request.

      • getOwnId

        protected abstract long getOwnId()
        Used to get the ID of the bot itself.
        Returns:
        The ID of the bot itself.

      • logDebug

        protected abstract void logDebug(java.lang.String message)
        Used to print information on DEBUG level using the logging implementation provided by the libraries.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to print.
